mapper.select: select ID As id, USERNAME As userName, PASSWORD As password, REAL_NAME As realName, LINK_PHONE As linkPhone, REG_DATE As regDate, SEX As sex, AGE As age, ADDRESS As address, ID_CARD As idCard, ROLE_LEVEL As roleLevel, STATE As state, NOTE As note from tb_account where userName=#{userName} and password=#{password}

select ID As id, USERNAME As userName, PASSWORD As password, REAL_NAME As realName, LINK_PHONE As linkPhone, REG_DATE As regDate, SEX As sex, AGE As age, ADDRESS As address, ID_CARD As idCard, ROLE_LEVEL As roleLevel, STATE As state, NOTE As note from tb_account limit #{begin}, #{pageSize}

select ID As id, USERNAME As userName, PASSWORD As password, REAL_NAME As realName, LINK_PHONE As linkPhone, REG_DATE As regDate, SEX As sex, AGE As age, ADDRESS As address, ID_CARD As idCard, ROLE_LEVEL As roleLevel, STATE As state, NOTE As note from tb_account where id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_account SET USERNAME =#{userName}, PASSWORD =#{password}, REAL_NAME =#{realName}, LINK_PHONE =#{linkPhone}, REG_DATE =#{regDate}, SEX =#{sex}, AGE =#{age}, ADDRESS =#{address}, ID_CARD =#{idCard}, ROLE_LEVEL =#{roleLevel}, STATE =#{state}, NOTE =#{note} WHERE ID = #{id}
